title: Facebook ‘supreme court’ admits ‘frustrations’ in 5 years of work
description: An oversight board created by Facebook to review content-moderation decisions trumpeted improved transparency and respect for people’s rights in a survey of their first five years of work on Thursday, while acknowledging “frustrations” to their arm’s-length r…
content:
Often referred to as Meta's 'supreme court', the Oversight Board began work in 2020 - Copyright AFP Christophe SIMON
